p3linux.c File Reference

Detailed Description

Protected Point to Point Linux functions file

Copyright (C) Velocite 2010

The Velocite Systems Protected Point to Point (P3) Linux functions are specific to the Linux kernel. These functions include:

  • Initialization
  • Memory mapping
  • IO Control
  • Packet interception
  • Cleanup

#include "p3knet.h"

Function Documentation

void p3errmsg ( int  type,
char *  message 
)

Function:
p3errmsg
Description:
Handle error messages for the P3 system. The types of messages are defined in the p3kbase.h include file. They are:
  • Critical: Caused by system errors
  • Error: Caused by application errors
  • Warning: Does not cause application shutdown, but indicate the need for adminstrative correction
  • Notice: Information that is always reported, such as startup
  • Information: Information such as usage statistics. This may be ignored using the -I command line argument
Inputs:
  • type: The type of the message
  • message: The text of the message
Outputs:
  • None

References _p3util::flag, line, MSG_TIME, NULL, p3MSG_CRIT, p3MSG_DEBUG, p3MSG_ERR, p3MSG_INFO, p3MSG_NOTICE, p3MSG_WARN, and p3UTL_NINFO.

Referenced by AESALGO_blockDecrypt(), AESALGO_blockEncrypt(), AESALGO_makeAesKey(), buffer_handler(), build_p3table(), build_vlen_message(), DoAES(), getsubnetcfg(), init_kernel_comm(), init_key_serv(), init_p3net(), init_pri_ui(), init_primary(), init_primaryplus(), init_raw_socket(), init_sec_ui(), init_secondary(), main(), p3_decrypt(), p3_encrypt(), p3_get_key(), p3_init_crypto(), p3_lookup(), p3_rekey(), p3send_control(), packet_handler(), parse_ctl_message(), parse_p3data(), pri_init_config(), pri_parse_cmdline(), pri_parse_config(), priplus_parse_cmdline(), receive_ioctl(), rekey_session(), rekey_test_pri(), replace_key(), sec_init_config(), sec_parse_cmdline(), sec_parse_config(), send_ioctl(), update_prihost(), and update_sechost().

int p3net_utils ( int  type,
void *  p3skb,
void *  p3pkt 
)

Function:
p3net_utils
Description:
Handle network utility functions. These include:
  • Set a TCP checksum
  • Get the MTU size for an interface
Inputs:
  • type: Utility function type:
    • p3TCP_CHECK
    • p3TCP_CHECK_ADD
    • p3GET_MTU
    • p3SEND_CTL
  • p3skb: Socket buffer structure which is cast to the platform specific structure.
  • p3pkt: The packet structure, which is cast to a p3packet struture, may be used to pass or return data.
Outputs:
  • Status

References _p3packet::flag, _p3packet::netdata, NULL, p3GET_MTU, p3PKT_SIZE, p3SEND_CTL, p3TCP_CHECK, p3TCP_CHECK_ADD, and _p3packet::packet.

Referenced by p3send_control(), and packet_handler().

module_init ( p3primary_init   ) 

Kernel Functions:

module_init
Register the kernel module initialization routine with the Linux kernel.
module_exit
Register the kernel module exit routine with the Linux kernel.
